name: dragino-lt22222l
description: Dragino LT-22222-L LoRa I/O Controller plugin for Thinger.io
author: Thinger.io

ACI1_mA.description: Current reading of Analog Input 1 in milliamps

ACI2_mA.description: Current reading of Analog Input 2 in milliamps

AVI1_V.description: Voltage reading of Analog Input 1 in volts

AVI2_V.description: Voltage reading of Analog Input 2 in volts

DI1_status.description: Status of Digital Input 1 (0 = LOW, 1 = HIGH)

DI2_status.description: Status of Digital Input 2 (0 = LOW, 1 = HIGH)

DO1_status.description: Status of Digital Output 1 (0 = OFF, 1 = ON)

DO2_status.description: Status of Digital Output 2 (0 = OFF, 1 = ON)

RO1_status.description: Status of Relay Output 1 (0 = OFF, 1 = ON)

RO2_status.description: Status of Relay Output 2 (0 = OFF, 1 = ON)

props.description: Select Replace Downlink or Push to Queue
props.label: Mode

props.description: Select Replace Downlink or Push to Queue
props.label: Mode
